pubspec.name: stream
pubspec.description: Lightweight Dart web server supporting request routing, filtering, template engine, MVC design pattern, and file-based static resources.

suggestions.title: Fix `lib/src/rsp_util.dart`.
suggestions.description:
Analysis of `lib/src/rsp_util.dart` failed with 1 error, 22 hints, including:

line 170 col 47: The getter 'dart' isn't defined for the class 'Browser'.

line 6 col 1: Prefer using /// for doc comments.

line 12 col 3: Prefer using /// for doc comments.

line 25 col 34: Use `isNotEmpty` for Iterables and Maps.

line 26 col 9: DO use curly braces for all flow control structures.

suggestions.title: Fix `lib/src/rspc/compiler.dart`.
suggestions.description:
Analysis of `lib/src/rspc/compiler.dart` reported 98 hints, including:

line 6 col 1: Prefer using /// for doc comments.

line 30 col 59: Use `=` to separate a named parameter from its default value.

line 31 col 19: Use `=` to separate a named parameter from its default value.

line 31 col 43: Use `=` to separate a named parameter from its default value.

line 44 col 7: DO use curly braces for all flow control structures.

suggestions.title: Fix `lib/src/plugin/router.dart`.
suggestions.description:
Analysis of `lib/src/plugin/router.dart` reported 56 hints, including:

line 6 col 1: Prefer using /// for doc comments.

line 10 col 3: Prefer using /// for doc comments.

line 19 col 43: Use `=` to separate a named parameter from its default value.

line 20 col 3: Prefer using /// for doc comments.

line 28 col 59: Use `=` to separate a named parameter from its default value.

suggestions.title: Fix additional 14 files with analysis or formatting issues.
suggestions.description:
Additional issues in the following files:

- `lib/src/rspc/tag.dart` (52 hints)
- `lib/src/server.dart` (43 hints)
- `lib/src/server_impl.dart` (39 hints)
- `lib/src/plugin/loader.dart` (35 hints)
- `lib/src/connect.dart` (30 hints)
- `lib/src/rspc/tag_util.dart` (30 hints)
- `lib/src/rspc/build.dart` (26 hints)
- `lib/src/connect_impl.dart` (24 hints)
- `lib/src/plugin/loader_impl.dart` (18 hints)
- `lib/src/rspc/main.dart` (9 hints)
- `lib/proxy.dart` (5 hints)
- `lib/plugin.dart` (1 hint)
- `lib/rspc.dart` (1 hint)
- `lib/stream.dart` (1 hint)

suggestions.title: Provide a file named `CHANGELOG.md`.
suggestions.description: Changelog entries help developers follow the progress of your package. See the [example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dart-lang/stagehand/master/templates/package-simple/CHANGELOG.md) generated by `stagehand`.

suggestions.title: Use constrained dependencies.
suggestions.description: The `pubspec.yaml` contains 6 dependencies without version constraints. Specify version ranges for the following dependencies: `args`, `charcode`, `http`, `logging`, `path`, `rikulo_commons`.

suggestions.title: Documentation URL is insecure.
suggestions.description: Update the `documentation` field and use a secure (`https`) URL.

suggestions.title: Homepage URL is insecure.
suggestions.description: Update the `homepage` field and use a secure (`https`) URL.

suggestions.title: Maintain an example.
suggestions.description:
None of the files in the package's `example/` directory matches known example patterns.

Common filename patterns include `main.dart`, `example.dart`, and `stream.dart`. Packages with multiple examples should provide `example/README.md`.

For more information see the [pub package layout conventions](https://www.dartlang.org/tools/pub/package-layout#examples).
